headline: I&M is Future Ready with Plans to Enhance Diverse Energy Mix
summary: Indiana Michigan Power (I&M), an American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) company, recently submitted its 2024 Integrated Resource Plan (IRP) to the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission (IURC). I&M's plan outlines the transformation the company is undergoing to meet the evolving energy needs of customers while maintaining reliable and consistent power.
